name: feature-base
title: Feature Base
description: Integration with Feature Base for Botpress

id.title: ID
id.description: The Feature Base ID of the user

postCreated.title: Post Created
postCreated.description: A post was created on a board.

createdAt.description: Date when the event was created

deliveryAttempts.description: The number of times the event tried to be delivered

postUpdated.title: Post Updated
postUpdated.description: A post was updated on a board.

createdAt.description: Date when the event was created

deliveryAttempts.description: The number of times the event tried to be delivered

postDeleted.title: Post Deleted
postDeleted.description: A post was deleted on a board.

createdAt.description: Date when the event was created

deliveryAttempts.description: The number of times the event tried to be delivered

postVoted.title: Post voted
postVoted.description: A post was voted on a board.

createdAt.description: Date when the event was created

deliveryAttempts.description: The number of times the event tried to be delivered

id.description: The unique identifier of the board.

category.description: The name of the board/category. Example: "Feature Requests"

private.description: Flag indicating whether this board is private.

segmentIds.description: An array of segment IDs associated with this board.

roles.description: An array of roles that have access to this board.

hiddenFromRoles.description: An array of roles that cannot see this board.

disablePostCreation.description: Flag indicating whether post creation is disabled for this board.

disableFollowUpQuestions.description: Flag indicating whether follow-up questions are disabled for this board.

customInputFields.description: An array of custom input fields ids that apply to this board.

defaultAuthorOnly.description: Flag indicating whether posts in this board are visible to the author only by default.

defaultCompanyOnly.description: Flag indicating whether posts in this board are visible to the company only by default.

id.description: The unique identifier of the board to retrieve.
The unique identifier of the board.

category.description: The name of the board/category. Example: "Feature Requests"

private.description: Flag indicating whether this board is private.

segmentIds.description: An array of segment IDs associated with this board.

roles.description: An array of roles that have access to this board.

hiddenFromRoles.description: An array of roles that cannot see this board.

disablePostCreation.description: Flag indicating whether post creation is disabled for this board.

disableFollowUpQuestions.description: Flag indicating whether follow-up questions are disabled for this board.

customInputFields.description: An array of custom input fields ids that apply to this board.

defaultAuthorOnly.description: Flag indicating whether posts in this board are visible to the author only by default.

defaultCompanyOnly.description: Flag indicating whether posts in this board are visible to the company only by default.

createPost.title: Create a post
createPost.description: Create a post on feature base

title.description: The title of the submission. It must be at least 2 characters long.

category.description: The board (a.k.a category) of the submission.

content.description: The content of the submission. Can be an empty string.

email.description: The email of the user submitting the post. Will create a new user if the email is not associated with an existing user.

authorName.description: Used when you provide an email. If the email is not associated with an existing user, a new user will be created with this name.

tags.description: The tags associated with the submission. Needs to be an array of tag names.

commentsAllowed.description: Flag indicating whether comments are allowed on the submission.

q.description: Search for posts by title or content.

category.description: Filter posts by providing an array of category(board) names.

sortBy.description: Sort posts by a specific attribute.

startDate.description: Get posts created after a specific date.

endDate.description: Get posts created before a specific date.

nextToken.description: Use the token to fetch the next page of posts.

title.description: The title of the post. Example: "Add dark mode support"

content.description:
The HTML content of the post. Example: "

It would be great to have dark mode support for better viewing at night.

"

status.description: The status of the submission. Example: "In Progress"

commentsAllowed.description: Flag indicating whether comments are allowed on the submission. Example: true

category.description: The category of the submission. Example: "ðŸ’¡ Feature Request"

sendStatusUpdateEmail.description: Flag indicating whether to send a status update email to the upvoters. Default: false

tags.description: The tags of the submission. Example: ["tag1", "tag2"]

inReview.description: Flag indicating whether the submission is in review. In review posts are not visible to users.

submissionId.description: The id of the submission to get comments for.

changelogId.description: The id of the changelog to get comments for. Accepts both ObjectId and slug. Example: "65f5f3c037fc63b7d43d0f16" or "my-changelog-slug"

privacy.description: Filter comments by privacy setting. Allowed values: "public", "private", "all"

inReview.description: Filter comments by whether they are in review. Set to true to get only comments that are in review.

commentThreadId.description: Given a specific comment id, this will return all comments in the thread with the root comment being the comment with the given id.

limit.description: Number of results per page. Default is 10.

id.title: ID
id.description: The Feature Base ID of the comment

rootCommentId.title: Root Comment ID
rootCommentId.description: The Feature Base ID of the root comment of the reply chain

submissionId.title: Submission ID
submissionId.description: The Feature Base ID of the submission (post) where the comment was posted
